    "import numpy as np\n",
    "import pandas as pd\n",
    "import matplotlib.pyplot as plt\n",
    "import tensorflow as tf\n",
    "%matplotlib inline\n",
    "\n",
    "## tf.enable_eager_execution()  <--- bloquea jupyter\n",
    "\n",
    "tf.logging.set_verbosity(tf.logging.ERROR)\n",
    "tf.set_random_seed(123)"

   "source": [

   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 2,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "dftrain = pd.read_csv('https://storage.googleapis.com/tfbt/titanic_train.csv')\n",
    "dfeval = pd.read_csv('https://storage.googleapis.com/tfbt/titanic_eval.csv')\n",
    "y_train = dftrain.pop('survived')\n",
    "y_eval = dfeval.pop('survived')"
   ]

    "(pd.concat([dftrain, y_train], axis=1)\n",

  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "## Preparación"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 13,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "fc = tf.feature_column\n",
    "\n",
    "CATEGORICAL_COLUMNS = [\n",
    "    'sex', \n",
    "    'n_siblings_spouses', \n",
    "    'parch', \n",
    "    'class', \n",
    "    'deck', \n",
    "    'embark_town', \n",
    "    'alone']\n",
    "\n",
    "NUMERIC_COLUMNS = [\n",
    "    'age', \n",
    "    'fare']\n",
    "  \n",
    "def one_hot_cat_column(feature_name, vocab):\n",
    "    return fc.indicator_column(\n",
    "        fc.categorical_column_with_vocabulary_list(feature_name,\n",
    "                                                   vocab))"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 14,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "feature_columns = []"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 15,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "for feature_name in CATEGORICAL_COLUMNS:\n",
    "    vocabulary = dftrain[feature_name].unique()\n",
    "    feature_columns.append(one_hot_cat_column(feature_name, vocabulary))"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 16,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "  \n",
    "for feature_name in NUMERIC_COLUMNS:\n",
    "    feature_columns.append(fc.numeric_column(feature_name,\n",
    "                                           dtype=tf.float32))"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 17,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "name": "stdout",
     "output_type": "stream",
     "text": [
      "Feature value: \"Third\"\n"
     ]
    },

      "\u001b[0;31mAttributeError\u001b[0m: 'Tensor' object has no attribute 'numpy'"
     ]
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "example = dftrain.head(1)\n",
    "class_fc = one_hot_cat_column('class', ('First', 'Second', 'Third'))\n",
    "print('Feature value: \"{}\"'.format(example['class'].iloc[0]))\n",
    "print('One-hot encoded: ', fc.input_layer(dict(example), [class_fc]).numpy())"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 18,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "ename": "AttributeError",
     "evalue": "'Tensor' object has no attribute 'numpy'",
     "output_type": "error",
     "traceback": [
      "\u001b[0;31m---------------------------------------------------------------------------\u001b[0m",
      "\u001b[0;31mAttributeError\u001b[0m                            Traceback (most recent call last)",
      "\u001b[0;32m<ipython-input-18-52ee44ae91d6>\u001b[0m in \u001b[0;36m<module>\u001b[0;34m\u001b[0m\n\u001b[0;32m----> 1\u001b[0;31m \u001b[0mfc\u001b[0m\u001b[0;34m.\u001b[0m\u001b[0minput_layer\u001b[0m\u001b[0;34m(\u001b[0m\u001b[0mdict\u001b[0m\u001b[0;34m(\u001b[0m\u001b[0mexample\u001b[0m\u001b[0;34m)\u001b[0m\u001b[0;34m,\u001b[0m \u001b[0mfeature_columns\u001b[0m\u001b[0;34m)\u001b[0m\u001b[0;34m.\u001b[0m\u001b[0mnumpy\u001b[0m\u001b[0;34m(\u001b[0m\u001b[0;34m)\u001b[0m\u001b[0;34m\u001b[0m\u001b[0;34m\u001b[0m\u001b[0m\n\u001b[0m",
      "\u001b[0;31mAttributeError\u001b[0m: 'Tensor' object has no attribute 'numpy'"
     ]
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "fc.input_layer(dict(example), feature_columns).numpy()"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 19,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "NUM_EXAMPLES = len(y_train)\n",
    "\n",
    "def make_input_fn(X, y, n_epochs=None, shuffle=True):\n",
    "\n",
    "    def input_fn():\n",
    "        dataset = tf.data.Dataset.from_tensor_slices((dict(X), y))\n",
    "        if shuffle:\n",
    "            dataset = dataset.shuffle(NUM_EXAMPLES)\n",
    "\n",
    "        dataset = dataset.repeat(n_epochs)  \n",
    "        \n",
    "        dataset = dataset.batch(NUM_EXAMPLES)\n",
    "        \n",
    "        return dataset\n",
    "    \n",
    "    return input_fn\n",
    "\n",
    "\n",
    "train_input_fn = make_input_fn(\n",
    "    dftrain, \n",
    "    y_train)\n",
    "\n",
    "eval_input_fn = make_input_fn(\n",
    "    dfeval, \n",
    "    y_eval, \n",
    "    shuffle=False, \n",
    "    n_epochs=1)"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "## Entrenamiento del modelo"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 20,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "name": "stdout",
     "output_type": "stream",
     "text": [
      "Accuracy :  0.719697\n",
      "Dummy model:  0.625\n"
     ]
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "linear_est = tf.estimator.LinearClassifier(feature_columns)\n",
    "\n",
    "linear_est.train(\n",
    "    train_input_fn, \n",
    "    max_steps=2)\n",
    "\n",
    "\n",
    "results = linear_est.evaluate(eval_input_fn)\n",
    "\n",
    "print('Accuracy : ', results['accuracy'])\n",
    "print('Dummy model: ', results['accuracy_baseline'])"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 21,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "name": "stdout",
     "output_type": "stream",
     "text": [
      "Accuracy :  0.74242425\n",
      "Dummy model:  0.625\n"
     ]
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "n_batches = 1\n",
    "est = tf.estimator.BoostedTreesClassifier(\n",
    "    feature_columns,\n",
    "    n_batches_per_layer=n_batches)\n",
    "\n",
    "est.train(\n",
    "    train_input_fn, \n",
    "    max_steps=2)\n",
    "\n",
    "results = est.evaluate(eval_input_fn)\n",
    "\n",
    "print('Accuracy : ', results['accuracy'])\n",
    "print('Dummy model: ', results['accuracy_baseline'])"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 22,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "##\n",
    "## Manejo en memoria\n",
    "##\n",
    "def make_inmemory_train_input_fn(X, y):\n",
    "    def input_fn():\n",
    "        return dict(X), y\n",
    "    return input_fn"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 23,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "train_input_fn = make_inmemory_train_input_fn(\n",
    "    dftrain, \n",
    "    y_train)"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 24,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "eval_input_fn = make_input_fn(\n",
    "    dfeval, \n",
    "    y_eval, \n",
    "    shuffle=False, \n",
    "    n_epochs=1)"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": null,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "est = tf.contrib.estimator.boosted_trees_classifier_train_in_memory(\n",
    "    train_input_fn,\n",
    "    feature_columns)"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": null,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "print(est.evaluate(eval_input_fn)['accuracy'])"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": null,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "pred_dicts = list(est.predict(eval_input_fn))\n",
    "\n",
    "probs = pd.Series([pred['probabilities'][1] for pred in pred_dicts])\n",
    "\n",
    "probs.plot(kind='hist', bins=20, title='predicted probabilities');"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": null,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "from sklearn.metrics import roc_curve\n",
    "\n",
    "fpr, tpr, _ = roc_curve(y_eval, probs)\n",
    "plt.plot(fpr, tpr)\n",
    "plt.title('ROC curve')\n",
    "plt.xlabel('false positive rate')\n",
    "plt.ylabel('true positive rate')\n",
    "plt.xlim(0,)\n",
    "plt.ylim(0,);"
   ]
  }
 ],
